fields.value: Census of Population and Housing, 1970 Public Use Sample: 5%, One-in-One-Hundred [Extract of M297, Labor Force, Persons, Selection of Variables -- Prepared by Don Treiman] (M348V1)

dsDescriptionValue.value: This file is based on the 1970 U.S. Census of Population and Housing Public Use Sample: 5% 1-in-100 sample of persons in the labor force and contains a selection of variables. The file was prepared by Donald Treiman. The file contains both household and person records.
